tool_description: Retreive latest news about the United States Congress from around the world.
name: US Congress Top News
title: US Congress Top News

api_list.name: Top Congressional News
api_list.description: Returns aggregate news articles related to US Congress from around the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-congress-top-news.p.rapidapi.com/top_congressional_news.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-congress-top-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-congress-top-news.p.rapidapi.com/top_congressional_news.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-congress-top-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
